alert.note: Alert for South Slopes of the Western Brooks Range; Upper Kobuk Valleys (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 15 at 6:17AM AKST until January 16 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO NOON AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow with low visibility expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 12 inches. Winds gusting to 45 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...South Slopes of the Western Brooks Range and Upper Kobuk Valleys. * WHEN...From noon today to noon AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.

area.areaDesc: South Slopes of the Western Brooks Range; Upper Kobuk Valleys
